tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_hash STRING,
    block_number INT,
    sender_address STRING,
    receiver_address STRING,
    amount FLOAT,
    gas_used INT
)

CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    block_id INT,
    transaction_hash VARCHAR(255), 
    sender_address VARCHAR(255),
    receiver_address VARCHAR(255),
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(18, 2), 
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_anomalies (
    anomaly_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id INT,
    anomaly_description TEXT,
    anomaly_type VARCHAR(50),
    detected_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_hash VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    block_number INT NOT NULL,
    transaction_data JSONB,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE block_miners (
    miner_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    miner_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    mining_power DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    mining_pool VARCHAR(100),
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_participants (
    participant_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    transaction_id UUID,
    role VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES blockchain_transactions(transaction_id)
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    block_number INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ,
    sender_address TEXT,
    receiver_address TEXT,
    amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_details (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_type TEXT,
    fee DECIMAL,
    status TEXT,
    gas_used INT
);

CREATE TABLE block_details (
    block_number INT PRIMARY KEY,
    block_hash TEXT,
    miner_address TEXT,
    block_size INT,
    transaction_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    block_id INT,
    transaction_hash VARCHAR(255),
    sender_address VARCHAR(255),
    receiver_address VARCHAR(255),
    amount DECIMAL(18,2),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE block_details (
    block_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    block_hash VARCHAR(255),
    num_transactions INT,
    miner_address VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE address_history (
    address_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    address VARCHAR(255),
    total_transactions INT,
    total_amount_received DECIMAL(18,2),
    total_amount_sent DECIMAL(18,2)
);

CREATE TABLE anomaly_log (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id INT,
    block_id INT,
    anomaly_type VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
